ComicInfo.Series: Justice League vs. Godzilla vs. Kong
ComicInfo.Summary: Justice League vs. Godzilla vs. Kong [Part 3]: In Metropolis, with Superman near death, Shazam, Supergirl, Hawkgirl, and Atom Smasher take on Godzilla. In Central City, Green Lantern battles against Scylla, while the Flash attempts to stop prisoners of Iron Heights who have escaped during Scylla's attack. On Themyscira, Wonder Woman and Donna Troy battle Behemoth, while on Skull Island, Green Arrow encounters King Kong.
